snippet: Mark Attanasio, who puts a priority on retaining his leaders, recently gave contract extensions to General Manager Doug Melvin and Manager Ron Roenicke.
abstract: Mark Attanasio, who puts a priority on retaining his leaders, recently gave contract extensions to General Manager Doug Melvin and Manager Ron Roenicke.

headline.main: Brewers' Owner Invests in Team That Built Team
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Brewers’ Owner Invests in Team That Built Team
